channel.title: Projects on LLTT
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on LLTT

item.title: Canvass Maps
item.description: Paper walk map produced for political campaigns nbefore the age of digital canvassing tools. Shaded and numbered parcels indicate the locations of targeted voters.

item.title: San Juan Islands Map
item.description: Built in QGIS with data from NOAA, US Department of Agricutlure, San Juan County, Whatcom County, and Skagit County

item.title: Voter's Edge
item.description: Was responsible for the contents of the backend databases used to provide address-customized ballots to millions of users of VotersEdge.org, a popular online voter guide application.
